title: Gps Position
description: Set GPS Position of the Device. url: https://www.route4me.com/track/set.php

member_id.title: Member id
member_id.descrption: The member id retrieved from the website that this instance of the application belongs to

route_id.title: Route id
route_id.descrption: The route id that is currently open on the user's phone

tx_id.title: tx id
tx_id.descrption: On the first request you do not need to provide a tx_id. On the second request you provide the tx_id which you got back from the first request. The tx_id is the unique group of points related to this specific route transaction

vehicle_id.title: Vehicle id
vehicle_id.descrption: Each vehicle added into the system will have a vehicle id if the user added a vehicle. If the user did not add the vehicle, then the vehicle id will be zero

course.title: Course
course.descrption: The direction in degrees in which the vehicle is heading

speed.title: Speed
speed.descrption: The speed with which the vehicle is moving

lat.title: Latitude
lat.descrption: The current latitude position of the device

lng.title: Longitude
lng.descrption: The current longitude position of the device

altitude.title: Altitude
altitude.descrption: Altitude relative to sea level of the device being tracked

device_type.title: Device type
device_type.descrption: The device type submitting the data

device_timestamp.title: Device timestamp
device_timestamp.descrption: The timestamp on the local (remote relative to the server) device

app_version.title: Application version
app_version.descrption: The version of the app submitting the data
